SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.actor.plane

Class UserPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.actor.plane.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.actor.plane.UserPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserPlane extends FighterPlane
The UserPlane class represents a fighter plane controlled by a user in the game. It extends the FighterPlane class and includes additional functionality specific to the user-controlled plane, such as handling health changes and applying damage.

The UserPlane class maintains a list of HealthChangeHandlers that are notified whenever the health of the plane changes. It also includes methods for adding and removing these handlers.

The class provides methods for applying damage to the plane, triggering visual effects when damage is taken, and checking if the plane is destroyed. It also keeps track of the number of kills made by the user plane and provides methods for retrieving and incrementing the kill count.

See Also:

      Constructs a UserPlane object with the specified configuration and player ID.
      Parameters:
      config - the configuration settings for the plane
      playerId - the ID of the player controlling the plane

  • Method Details

    • performAdditionalUpdates

      protected void performAdditionalUpdates(long now)
      Performs any additional updates specific to the UserPlane. This method is called during the update cycle and can be overridden to implement custom behavior.
      Overrides:
      performAdditionalUpdates in class FighterPlane
      Parameters:
      now - The current time in nanoseconds.

    • addHealthChangeHandler

      public void addHealthChangeHandler(HealthChangeHandler handler)
      Adds a HealthChangeHandler to the list of handlers that will be notified when the health of the UserPlane changes.
      Parameters:
      handler - the HealthChangeHandler to be added

    • removeHealthChangeHandler

      public void removeHealthChangeHandler(HealthChangeHandler handler)
      Removes a HealthChangeHandler from the list of handlers.
      Parameters:
      handler - the HealthChangeHandler to be removed

    • takeDamage

      public boolean takeDamage()
      Applies damage to the user plane by decrementing its health. Notifies any handlers of the health change and triggers a visual flicker effect if the plane is not destroyed. If the health reaches zero, the plane is destroyed.
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      true if damage was applied or the plane was destroyed, false otherwise.

    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      Checks if the user plane is destroyed.
      Overrides:
      isDestroyed in class ActiveActor
      Returns:
      true if the health of the user plane is less than or equal to 0, false otherwise.

    • getNumberOfKills

      public int getNumberOfKills()
      Retrieves the number of kills made by the user plane.
      Returns:
      the number of kills

    • incrementKillCount

      public void incrementKillCount()
      Increments the kill count for the user plane by one.
